itemDescription: body architect ; trained as a classical ballerina and architect

wikipedia_page.main: Lucy McRae (born 1979) is a British-born Australian science fiction artist, body architect, film maker and TED fellow. Her installations include film, photography, sculptures, and edible and wearable technology.

response: * Lucy McRae – art direction, body architect
* Lucy McRae, b. 1979, Australian, body architect
